mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_SEQ, CATEGORY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, PILL_NAME, DETAIL_CONTENT, PILL_HOWTO, INTAKE_PRECAUTIONS, ATPNQESITM, INTRCQESITM, SEQESITM, PILL_DEPOSIT, TO_CHAR(OPEN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPEN_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE, PILL_COLOR, PILL_SHAPE, PILL_IMAGE FROM TBL_PILL WHERE ITEM_SEQ = #{itemSeq}

SELECT COUNT(ITEM_SEQ) FROM TBL_PILL
WHERE ${keywordType} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
